duties_responsibilities.duty: Caring for plants in the vegetative state in either the mom, clone or veg room.
Transplanting, cutting clones, watering, trimming, bottoming, topping, pruning, and defoliating.
Recognizing requirements associated with the strain, growth patterns, and identifying anomalies within the plants.
Participating in all aspects of plant maintenance depending on Cultivation needs.
Using dexterity, coordination, and precision to perform manual plant maintenance activities.
Maintaining open communication with the Leadership team and co-workers.
Cleaning and sanitizing all flower rooms, benches, irrigation systems, etc. to ensure cleanliness.
Following department-specific work instructions and SOP’s.
Meeting production goals while maintaining performance, safety, and quality.
Being aware of hazards in the workspace and reporting safety incidents/concerns.
Complying with area safety requirements, state regulations, and PPE requirements.
Performing record-keeping accurately and completely as directed by a lead or supervisor.
Maintaining and calibrating tools, equipment, and machinery as directed by a lead or supervisor.
Reporting and escalating safety & quality concerns.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of a high school diploma. GED, or associate degree or certifications preferred.
Prior experience in manufacturing or fast-paced environment.
Ability to utilize simple math for calculations.
